Description:
Job Summary To achieve financial and non-financial sales targets of all the assigned products.
Understand customer’s requirements and advise solutions based on the policies and guidelines set by the Bank
Meet customer expectations by providing complete information and providing accurate & timely feedback.Key AccountabilitiesAcquire new business relationships (employer/organization) and explore associated opportunities.
Present banking products and services to potential companies/ customers.
Provide quality service to customers/ companies at their door stepOther AccountabilitiesManage relationships with assigned CB@Work/ non CB@Work companies/ key contacts as per bank’s given guidelines.
Identify the potential companies for listing under “Approved List”, obtain required documents and prepare the file. Skills
Skills: Ability to interact with internal and external stakeholders
Awareness of local cultural and social factors, and labour law provisions
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or equivalent
